# Preface {.unnumbered}

This book is meant to be a resource for instructors to provide a complete guide for teaching Introduction to Statistics and Data Science.

All activities and lecture slides can be downloaded from the Posit Cloud [ISDS Course Content](https://posit.cloud/content/6672899)

Reading Tutorials are completed using RStudio. Visit the [isdsTutorials website](https://nustat.github.io/isdsTutorials/) for information on how to install the package and run the tutorials.
